sentences.en: Acute myocardial Infarction and Carcinogenic shock.
sentences.cn: 急性心肌梗死和心源性休克.

sentences.en: Chicken bottom contain carcinogenic substance, don't eat well.
sentences.cn: 鸡屁股含有致癌物, 不要吃较好.

sentences.en: Diet is too salty reach fry: These food contain carcinogenic substance . 3.
sentences.cn: 2.忌食过咸及油炸食物: 这些食物含有致癌物质.

sentences.en: Its exact role in the carcinogenic process, however, is still unclear.
sentences.cn: 但它在致癌过程的确切作用还不十分清楚.

sentences.en: Many PAHs are carcinogenic or are suspected to be carcinogenic.
sentences.cn: 其主要来源于煤的不完全燃烧,也有相当部分来源于汽车尾气的排放.

sentences.en: Many trees can absorb harmful substances in air and carcinogenic substances.
sentences.cn: 许多树木都能吸收空气中的有害物质和致癌物质.

sentences.en: Mold and carcinogenic nitrosamines a synergistic effect.
sentences.cn: 霉菌与亚硝胺有协同致癌作用.

sentences.en: No manufacturing of carcinogenic or mutagenic substances.
sentences.cn: 无致癌或致突变物质的制造.

sentences.en: R 40 : Limited evidence of a carcinogenic effect.
sentences.cn: R40打印机: 有限的致癌作用的证据.

sentences.en: Should be controlled as far as possible in producing a course and remove productivity carcinogenic substance.
sentences.cn: 在生产过程中应尽量控制和消除生产性致癌物.

sentences.en: Some food additives are carcinogenic, caused by saki, mutagenic effect.
sentences.cn: 有些食品添加剂还有致癌 、 致崎 、 致突变作用.

sentences.en: Some industrial chemicals can be very toxic or carcinogenic.
sentences.cn: 一些工业用化学品具有高度毒性或是致癌物质.

sentences.en: Some of the emissions are carcinogenic.
sentences.cn: 有些排放物质是致癌的.

sentences.en: The both carcinogenic factors were investigated on its dose - response ralationships.
sentences.cn: 研究上述两种致癌因子的剂量 - 效应相关模式.

sentences.en: There are often reports on their carcinogenic risk in the news media.
sentences.cn: 人工甜味剂在市场上被广泛用于减肥食品,新闻中常有其致癌风险的报道.
